topic.fullpath: Topic :: Software Development :: Algorithms :: Genetic Algorithms

name: Point Symmetry Clustering
short_description:
Implementation of Point Symmetry-based Automatic Clustering
Approach Using Differential Evolution

Using bug fixed KD tree nearest neighbor search from http://code.google.com/p/kmeansclustering/ . It is also modified to search for multiple nearest points instead only for one.

Used those academic works for alghorithm implementation:

http://cs.cug.edu.cn/teacherweb/gwy/Publication/ISICA-09.pdf

http://www.isical.ac.in/~sanghami/ieeetkde_cameraready.pdf
 
http://www.softcomputing.net/smca-paper1.pdf

1. You may download code: 
git clone git://git.code.sf.net/p/pointsymmetryclustering/code pointsymmetryclustering-code
2. Build: 
mvn clean install assembly:assembly -DskipTests -Dmaven.test.skip=true -DdownloadSources=true -Dcheckstyle.skip=true
3. Run:
java -jar target/point-symmetry-clustering-1.0-fat.jar
summary: Point Symmetry Clustering Approach Using Differential Evolution
